description: AWS::RoboMaker::Robot resource creates an AWS RoboMaker Robot.

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:[\w+=/,.@-]+:[\w+=/,.@-]+:[\w+=/,.@-]*:[0-9]*:[\w+=,.@-]+(/[\w+=,.@-]+)*  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

^[a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,128}$.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
^[a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,128}$.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Fleet.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the fleet.
Fleet.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the fleet.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: X86_64 | ARM64 | ARMHF

Name.markdownDescription:
